protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the NAD-dependent decarboxylation of UDP-glucuronic acid to UDP-xylose. Necessary for the biosynthesis of the core tetrasaccharide in glycosaminoglycan biosynthesis.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

reference.reference_text: Hwang HY, Horvitz HR: The SQV-1 UDP-glucuronic acid decarboxylase and the SQV-7 nucleotide-sugar transporter may act in the Golgi apparatus to affect Caenorhabditis elegans vulval morphogenesis and embryonic development. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2002 Oct 29;99(22):14218-23. Epub 2002 Oct 21.
